Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
AI is very dependent on your inputs and can provide very generic responses depending on your input. 
Teacher response is more targeted and personal. They generally include their personal experience and understanding and provide examples to back this up

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Trusting the teacher was better as they have lived experience. Made me feel more confident
